vision.notes: Emu have well-developed vision for detecting food and predators in their open habitat. The context mentions they forage on plants and insects, implying good visual acuity.

hearing.notes: Hearing is likely important for predator detection and communication. Ratites are generally known to have good hearing.

somatosensation.notes: Touch and other somatosensory modalities are important for general awareness of the environment and interactions with other individuals.

olfaction.notes: Olfaction in ratites is not well-described in the provided context.

taste.notes: Taste in ratites is not well-described in the provided context.
